duties_responsibilities.duty: Meet and exceed quarterly sales targets. Create, manage and execute a strategic territory coverage and sales plan.
Identify, qualify, orchestrate and close new business within net new and existing opportunities.
Develop a detailed understanding of organizational structure, competitive landscape, and technology heat map within entire account lists.
Prospect into targeted named accounts. Develop and execute field sales campaigns to create demand.
Manage multiple complex sales processes simultaneously and articulate the value proposition to prospects.
Work within a team environment; manage internal and external resources to execute account and deal strategy and maximize sales efforts and success rate.
